A mix of modern contemporary surroundings and a relaxing, laid back environment ensure that the 4-Star Clarion Hotel Liffey Valley is the finest choice for both business and pleasure. The Clarion Hotel Dublin Liffey Valley has 352 spacious bedrooms, decorated in light modern colours, many with floor-to-ceiling windows. Rooms include LED Flat Screen TV, free access to our uncontended 100MB Wi-Fi Internet access, and a 24-hour room service menu. We offer free WiFi throughout the hotel & all bedrooms are non-smoking Sinergie Restaurant offers exciting European flavours served with the freshest seasonal ingredients, prepared with a creative flair and passion. Kudos Bar has a relaxed atmosphere and serves authentic Asian cuisine, and a selection of European dishes. Guests a range of delicious and healthy snacks and dinners. Our SanoVitae Health & Fitness has fantastic facilities including a gym, 20-metre swimming pool, sauna, steam room and Jacuzzi. We have an extensive self-contained conference and events centre with 12 conference rooms, accommodating from 2 to 390 delegates, all of which are situated on the first floor, offering natural daylight with blackout facilities. The Clarion Hotel Liffey Valley is easily accessible by road, rail and Dublin Airport. We offer ample secure car parking for all guests. The hotel is ideally situated on the M50/N4 intersection at Liffey Valley, the gateway to the West of Ireland. A perfect location for exploring Dublin. Our younger guests are as important to us as every other guest so with this in mind, we have a variety of options available to keep the little ones busy during their stay.

  • Calm,Comfortable and Relaxing Rooms
  • Invigorating Health and Fitness Facilities
  • Tantalising Food at Sinergie Restaurant
  • Unwind at our Bar with a Cocktail
  • Amazing Offers and Special Packages
  • Meetings and Conferences a Pleasure
  • Celebrate your Special Wedding Day
